Corrección de errores
TB
RT
Fix when the main character is not in your party, the game will never consider that player is in combat
Arreglar que el combate no termine adecuadamente cuando se interrumpe por una escena
Arreglar que las unidades no abandonan el combate si estan inactivas (arregla un bug en Call Forth Kanerah / Kalikke)
Fix the action type of activating an item storing a full-round spell (e.g. summon scrolls) (Full Round Action => Standard Action)
Fix the action type of starting a Bardic Performance and the effect of Singing Steel
Fix the action type of swapping weapons (Standard Action => Move Action)
Fix the action type of Charge (Standard Action => Full Round Action)
Fix the action type of Overrun (Standard Action => Full Round Action)
Fix the action type of Vital Strike (Full Round Action => Standard Action)
Fix the action type of Angelic Form (Standard Action => Move Action)
Fix activating Kinetic Blade is regarded as drawing weapon and consumes an additional standard action
Fix Kineticist will not stop its previous action if you command it to attack with Kinetic Blade before combat
Fix Spellstrike does not take effect when attacking a neutral target
Fix Spellstrike does not take effect when using Metamagic (Reach) on a touch spell
Fix Spellstrike will apply a touch effect twice when hitting target with a natural weapon (or a unarmed attack)
Fix the damage bonus of Blast Rune isn't increased with class level (it's the first ability of Rune Domain)
Fix the damage bonus of some abilities (level / 2 + 1 => level / 2) (Blast Rune, Moonfire)
Fix the Fx effect of Shadow Evocation (Sirocco) is missing (use normal Sirocco to replace it)
Fix some abilities will not be auto deactivated after combat (Inspire Greatness, Inspire Heroics)
Fix Blind-Fight needs a extreme close distance to prevent from losing AC instead of melee distance
Fix Dweomer Leap can be triggered by ally and always consumes no action (it should consume a swift action)
Fix sometimes a confused unit can act normally because it tried to attack an unattackable dead unit
Fix you can use Acrobatics (Mobility) to avoid AoO even if the AoO is provoked due to reasons other than movement
Fix you can make an AoO to an unmoved unit as if it's leaving the threatened range (when switching from reach weapon)
Fix sometimes the game does not regard a unit that is forced to move as a unit that is moving (cause AoO behavior inconsistent)
Fix the visual circle of certain abilities is inconsistent with the real range
Fix the ability circle does not appear properly when first time selecting an ability of any unit (using a hotkey)
Fix you can target untargetable units using abilities
Fix you can target dead units using abilities that cannot be cast on dead targets
Fix certain neutral units can attack their ally (e.g. Techno League)
Fix certain aura effect will be triggered repeatedly when you inspect its owner (e.g. the aura of Tendriculos)
Fix inspecting enemies can cause errors in certain condition (e.g. when using Blindsense to against enemies who can ambush)
